Name: country
description: Country - Geographic location.

Name: year
description: Year - Year of observation.

Name: iso_code
description: ISO code - ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 three-letter country codes.

Name: population
description: Population - Population by country, available from 10,000 BCE to 2100, based on data and estimates from different sources.

Name: gdp
description: Gross domestic product (GDP) - This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.

Name: biofuel_cons_change_pct
description: Annual percentage change in biofuel consumption - Includes biogasoline (such as ethanol) and biodiesel. Volumes have been adjusted for energy content.

Name: biofuel_cons_change_twh
description: Annual change in biofuel consumption - Includes biogasoline (such as ethanol) and biodiesel. Volumes have been adjusted for energy content.

Name: biofuel_cons_per_capita
description: Biofuel consumption per capita - Measured in kilowatt-hours per person.

Name: biofuel_consumption
description: Primary energy consumption from biofuels - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: biofuel_elec_per_capita
description: Electricity generation from bioenergy per person - Measured in kilowatt-hours per person.

Name: biofuel_electricity
description: Electricity generation from bioenergy - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: biofuel_share_elec
description: Share of electricity generated by bioenergy - Measured as a percentage of total electricity.

Name: biofuel_share_energy
description: Share of primary energy consumption that comes from biofuels - Measured as a percentage of the total primary energy, using the substitution method.

Name: carbon_intensity_elec
description: Carbon intensity of electricity generation - Greenhouse gases emitted per unit of generated electricity, measured in grams of CO₂ equivalents per kilowatt-hour.
unit: grams of CO₂ equivalents per kilowatt-hour

Name: coal_cons_change_pct
description: Annual percentage change in coal consumption

Name: coal_cons_change_twh
description: Annual change in coal consumption

Name: coal_cons_per_capita
description: Coal consumption per capita - Measured in kilowatt-hours per person.

Name: coal_consumption
description: Primary energy consumption from coal - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: coal_elec_per_capita
description: Electricity generation from coal per person - Measured in kilowatt-hours per person.

Name: coal_electricity
description: Electricity generation from coal - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: coal_prod_change_pct
description: Annual change in coal production - Measured as a percentage of the previous year's production.

Name: coal_prod_change_twh
description: Annual change in coal production - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: coal_prod_per_capita
description: Coal production per capita - Measured in kilowatt-hours per capita.

Name: coal_production
description: Coal production - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: coal_share_elec
description: Share of electricity generated by coal - Measured as a percentage of total electricity.

Name: coal_share_energy
description: Share of primary energy consumption that comes from coal - Measured as a percentage of the total primary energy, using the substitution method.

Name: electricity_demand
description: Electricity demand - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: electricity_generation
description: Total electricity generation - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: electricity_share_energy
description: Total electricity generation as share of primary energy - Measured as a percentage of total, direct primary energy consumption.

Name: energy_cons_change_pct
description: Annual change in primary energy consumption

Name: energy_cons_change_twh
description: Annual change in primary energy consumption

Name: energy_per_capita
description: Primary energy consumption per capita - Measured in kilowatt-hours per person.

Name: energy_per_gdp
description: Primary energy consumption per GDP - Measured in kilowatt-hours per international-$.

Name: fossil_cons_change_pct
description: Annual percentage change in fossil fuel consumption

Name: fossil_cons_change_twh
description: Annual change in fossil fuel consumption

Name: fossil_elec_per_capita
description: Electricity generation from fossil fuels per person - Measured in kilowatt-hours per person.

Name: fossil_electricity
description: Electricity generation from fossil fuels - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: fossil_energy_per_capita
description: Fossil fuel consumption per capita - Measured in kilowatt-hours per person.

Name: fossil_fuel_consumption
description: Primary energy consumption from fossil fuels - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: fossil_share_elec
description: Share of electricity generated by fossil fuels - Measured as a percentage of total electricity.

Name: fossil_share_energy
description: Share of primary energy consumption that comes from fossil fuels - Measured as a percentage of the total primary energy, using the substitution method.

Name: gas_cons_change_pct
description: Annual percentage change in gas consumption

Name: gas_cons_change_twh
description: Annual change in gas consumption

Name: gas_consumption
description: Primary energy consumption from gas - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: gas_elec_per_capita
description: Electricity generation from gas per person - Measured in kilowatt-hours per person.

Name: gas_electricity
description: Electricity generation from gas - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: gas_energy_per_capita
description: Gas consumption per capita - Measured in kilowatt-hours per person.

Name: gas_prod_change_pct
description: Annual change in gas production - Measured as a percentage of the previous year's production.

Name: gas_prod_change_twh
description: Annual change in gas production - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: gas_prod_per_capita
description: Gas production per capita - Measured in kilowatt-hours per capita.

Name: gas_production
description: Gas production - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: gas_share_elec
description: Share of electricity generated by gas - Measured as a percentage of total electricity.

Name: gas_share_energy
description: Share of primary energy consumption that comes from gas - Measured as a percentage of the total primary energy, using the substitution method.

Name: greenhouse_gas_emissions
description: Emissions from electricity generation - Measured in megatonnes of CO₂ equivalents.

Name: hydro_cons_change_pct
description: Annual percentage change in hydropower consumption - Figures are based on gross primary hydroelectric generation and do not account for cross-border electricity supply.

Name: hydro_cons_change_twh
description: Annual change in hydropower consumption - Input-equivalent energy is based on gross generation and does not account for cross-border electricity supply.

Name: hydro_consumption
description: Primary energy consumption from hydropower - Measured in terawatt-hours, using the substitution method.

Name: hydro_elec_per_capita
description: Electricity generation from hydropower per person - Measured in kilowatt-hours per person.

Name: hydro_electricity
description: Electricity generation from hydropower - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: hydro_energy_per_capita
description: Hydropower consumption per capita - Measured in kilowatt-hours per person.

Name: hydro_share_elec
description: Share of electricity generated by hydropower - Measured as a percentage of total electricity.

Name: hydro_share_energy
description: Share of primary energy consumption that comes from hydropower - Measured as a percentage of the total primary energy, using the substitution method.

Name: low_carbon_cons_change_pct
description: Annual percentage change in low-carbon energy consumption - Figures are based on gross generation and do not account for cross-border electricity supply.

Name: low_carbon_cons_change_twh
description: Annual change in low-carbon energy consumption - Input-equivalent energy is based on gross generation and does not account for cross-border electricity supply.

Name: low_carbon_consumption
description: Primary energy consumption from low-carbon sources - Measured in terawatt-hours, using the substitution method.

Name: low_carbon_elec_per_capita
description: Electricity generation from low-carbon sources per person - Low-carbon sources correspond to renewables and nuclear power, that produce significantly less greenhouse-gas emissions than fossil fuels.

Name: low_carbon_electricity
description: Electricity generation from low-carbon sources - Low-carbon sources correspond to renewables and nuclear power, that produce significantly less greenhouse-gas emissions than fossil fuels.

Name: low_carbon_energy_per_capita
description: Low-carbon energy consumption per capita - Measured in kilowatt-hours per person.

Name: low_carbon_share_elec
description: Share of electricity generated by low-carbon sources - Low-carbon sources correspond to renewables and nuclear power, that produce significantly less greenhouse-gas emissions than fossil fuels.

Name: low_carbon_share_energy
description: Share of primary energy consumption that comes from low-carbon sources - Measured as a percentage of the total primary energy, using the substitution method.

Name: net_elec_imports
description: Net electricity imports - Electricity imports minus exports, measured in TWh.

Name: net_elec_imports_share_demand
description: Net electricity imports as a share of demand - Electricity imports minus exports, measured as a percentage of total electricity demand.

Name: nuclear_cons_change_pct
description: Annual percentage change in nuclear power consumption - Figures are based on gross generation and do not account for cross-border electricity supply.

Name: nuclear_cons_change_twh
description: Annual change in nuclear power consumption - Input-equivalent energy is based on gross generation and does not account for cross-border electricity supply.

Name: nuclear_consumption
description: Primary energy consumption from nuclear power - Measured in terawatt-hours, using the substitution method.

Name: nuclear_elec_per_capita
description: Electricity generation from nuclear power per person - Measured in kilowatt-hours per person.

Name: nuclear_electricity
description: Electricity generation from nuclear - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: nuclear_energy_per_capita
description: Nuclear power consumption per capita - Measured in kilowatt-hours per person.

Name: nuclear_share_elec
description: Share of electricity generated by nuclear power - Measured as a percentage of total electricity.

Name: nuclear_share_energy
description: Share of primary energy consumption that comes from nuclear power - Measured as a percentage of the total primary energy, using the substitution method.

Name: other_renewable_consumption
description: Primary energy consumption from other renewables - Measured in terawatt-hours, using the substitution method.

Name: other_renewable_electricity
description: Electricity generation from other renewables, including bioenergy - Measured in terawatt-hours.

Name: other_renewable_exc_biofuel_electricity

Name: other_renewables_share_energy
description: Share of primary energy consumption that comes from other renewables - Measured as a percentage of the total primary energy, using the substitution method.
